response:
A young woman with two lesions separated in space (optic nerve and cerebellum) strongly suggests inflammatory demyelination; alternatives considered to explain optic neuropathy plus cerebellar syndrome.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing-remitting Multiple Sclerosis", "Myelin Oligodendrocyte Glycoprotein Antibody-Associated Disease (MOGAD)", "Aquaporin-4 Antibody Positive Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder (AQP4-NMOSD)", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Autoimmune/Paraneoplastic Cerebellar Degeneration", "Cerebellar Infarction with unrelated Optic Neuritis", "Vitamin B12 Deficiency"]
